data.name: Terraformers
data.detailed_description:
Wishlist more Strategy games from Goblinz

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1989070/


More upcoming games

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1639080/Sandwalkers/https://store.steampowered.com/app/1768280/ozy/https://store.steampowered.com/app/1561040/DW/


Lead the first human settlement on Mars with this free prologue!

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1557040/Terraformers_First_Steps_on_Mars/


About the Game





  • Send your leaders to mysterious locations and be the first to discover rich resource depots, giant crystal caves and stunning natural wonders.
  • Found new cities on craters and in lava Tubes. Make them thrive and meet your population's rising demands.
  • Mine the rare metals of Mars, manufacture them into advanced goods and set up an effective transport system between your ever-growing cities.





  • Restart a volcano, construct giant space mirrors or crash ice asteroids to geo-engineer the entire planet.
  • From spreading adaptive bacteria, to planting full-grown forests with bears. Each life form has specific requirements and provides strategic benefits.





  • By making this game, we hope to inspire humankind to take its first steps out of the cradle and become an interplanetary species, starting with Mars! Do you want to join the terraforming movement, get updates about the game development, chat with us, and be the first to be considered for the closed alpha? Then join our Discord server!
data.about_the_game:
• Send your leaders to mysterious locations and be the first to discover rich resource depots, giant crystal caves and stunning natural wonders.
  • Found new cities on craters and in lava Tubes. Make them thrive and meet your population's rising demands.
  • Mine the rare metals of Mars, manufacture them into advanced goods and set up an effective transport system between your ever-growing cities.





  • Restart a volcano, construct giant space mirrors or crash ice asteroids to geo-engineer the entire planet.
  • From spreading adaptive bacteria, to planting full-grown forests with bears. Each life form has specific requirements and provides strategic benefits.





  • By making this game, we hope to inspire humankind to take its first steps out of the cradle and become an interplanetary species, starting with Mars! Do you want to join the terraforming movement, get updates about the game development, chat with us, and be the first to be considered for the closed alpha? Then join our Discord server!
data.short_description: Terraformers is an expansive turn-based colony builder and resource management game with roguelike elements. Explore the Red Planet, develop spectacular cities, spread life and terraform the planet with ambitious projects.
data.supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Polish

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows
  • Processor: TBD
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: TBD
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: i5 3rd generation (or newer) / FX4170 (or newer)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon 8000 series or newer / NVidia GTX 660 or newer

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: macOS 10.13
  • Processor: 1,3 GHz CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000 / AMD Radeon 5800 series
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: OS X 10.9.1
  • Processor: Dual-core 2Ghz CPU
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+
  • Processor: 1,3 GHz CPU
  • Graphics: Graphics card: DX9 (shader model 2.0) capabilities
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+ Desktop only
  • Processor: Dual-core 2Ghz CPU
  • Graphics: Graphics card: DX9 (shader model 2.0) capabilities
